name: Race or ethnicity distribution of workers with a bachelor's degree or higher in broad occupational groups, by nativity: 2019
description: Race or ethnicity distribution of workers with a bachelor's degree or higher in broad occupational groups, by nativity: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: broad_occupation_and_race_or_ethnicity
variableMeasured.description: Broad occupation and race or ethnicity hierarchy

notes: Hispanic may be any race; race categories exclude Hispanic origin. Workers in non-S&E occupations include middle-skill and non-STEM occupations. Detail may not add to total because of rounding, and percentages may not add to 100% because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), 2019.Science and Engineering Indicators
